text: Dęblin is a town in Lublin Voivodeship in Poland. In 2021, 15,505 people lived there. Its area is 38.33 km². Dęblin is at the confluence of the Vistula and Wieprz rivers. It is 40 km northwest of Lublin and is 50 km southeast of the Polish capital Warsaw. Since 1927, it has been the home of the Polish Air Force Academy. It has a fortress. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Lublin Voivodeship
title: Dęblin
